item.title: Jenkins部署配置
item.description: docker安装 docker-compose.yml version: '2' services: jenkins: image: jenkins/jenkins:lts ports: - 8080:8080 - 50000:50000 volumes: - /opt/jenkins:/var/jenkins_home restart: always sudo docker-compose up -d
